features.name: Rally (Class)
features.text: Once per session, give self and allies a Rally Die (d6 at Lvl 1).

features.name: Rousing Speech (Subclass)
features.text: Once per long rest, allies in Far range clear 2 Stress.

features.name: Heart of a Poet (Subclass)
features.text: After action roll to impress/persuade/offend, can spend 1 Hope to add d4.

features.name: Fungril Network (Ancestry)
features.text: Instinct Roll (12) to speak with other fungril at any distance.

features.name: Death Connection (Ancestry)
features.text: Touch corpse, mark 1 Stress to extract one memory.

features.name: Steady (Community)
features.text: Advantage on rolls to traverse dangerous cliffs, navigate harsh environments, etc.

armor.name: Full Plate Armor
features: Very Heavy: -2 to Evasion; -1 to Agility

domain_cards.name: Book of Illiat (Slumber)
domain_cards.effect: Spellcast Roll vs target (Very Close). On success, Asleep.

domain_cards.name: Book of Illiat (Arcane Barrage)
domain_cards.effect: Once per rest. Roll d6s equal to Hope spent, deal that much magic damage (Close).

domain_cards.name: Book of Illiat (Telepathy)
domain_cards.effect: Open mental communication with target you can see.

domain_cards.name: Enrapture
domain_cards.effect: Spellcast Roll vs target (Close). On success, Enraptured.
